title: Market Simulation Engine
shortDes: A high-performance market simulation engine for simulation financial markets end-to-end.
longDes: Built a market exchange featuring a custom order-matching engine that manages the order book using heaps and ensures database persistence. Optimized for low latency by parallelizing per-stock execution with multithreading (C++, SQLite). Simulated the complete market workflow, including a TCP exchange server, a UDP transaction recorder with an HTTP API for historical prices, and a terminal UI for real-time quotes and chart upyears (C++, Python, Docker).

title: Rent Price Predictor CNN
shortDes: A convolutional neural network to predict rent prices from Boston apartment images.
longDes: CNN to predict rental prices by integrating structured (location, year built) and unstructured (Google Street View images) data. Made using PyTorch and OpenCV.

title: Smart Rockets
shortDes: Reinforcement learning project using genetic algorithms to evolve rocket path-finding.
longDes: Reinforcement learning project using genetic algorithms to evolve rocket path-finding.

title: Our Space
shortDes: A collaborative site for crowdsourcing community requests.
longDes: ðŸŽ¯OurSpace enables crowdsourced service requests of communal spaces, and thus provides a domain where users can share their opinions and amplify their unspoken ideas- as well as discover new spaces within their community. ðŸŽ¯OurSpace strives to serve as a tool to collect voices and ideas about the 90% of issues about community spaces that are often missed due to a lack of community platform.
